name: ClickyChicky - The Fox's Steak Out
description:
Help your Rooster buddies keep their lirttle chick's safe from the sneaky fast foxes and their slower but hungrier pals!

Arrow L/R = Move

Space = Dispense Steak

A very small adaptation of the original concept, have so many more ideas for improvements but alas no time to implement them - eg. chicks saved score. The Roosters were removing foxes on impact but currently aren't (when I added the hungry foxes I changed the collisions and need to re-visit to re-instate rooster/fox destruction again and inverse for chick/fox collisions) :-p

also better win/loose/game over state.
